## Usage1

|Key binding         |Description         |
|--------------------|--------------------|
|`Arrows`, `hjkl`    |Move                |

The `EDITOR` or `WALK_EDITOR` environment variable used for opening files from
the walk.


|Key binding         |Description         |
|--------------------|--------------------|
|**Esc**, _q_        |Exit                |

The `EDITOR` or `WALK_EDITOR` environment variable used for opening files from
the walk.
